page.title: 07CUSTOMS
page.content: The Duchy of Cornwall was created under the Great Charter of1337,and is the oldest of English Duchies.It exists to provide an income for the Heir Apparent to the Throne.The Duchy is governed by the Council of His Royal Highness which determines policy. The Prince of Wales is Chairman.There is a resident Land Agent.In thge past 5o years there have been many Royal visitors to the area. The Duchy is the largest land owner, holding 75% of the acreage,and many properties.The current policy is to modernise the agricultural estate.As tennant farmers have retired,farm houses and cottages have been sold,and and acreage increased on other farms. In 1984 Duchy Home Farm with 45o acres was leased to Cornwall County Council and is now run as an Agricultural College.
